name: VR Date Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
name_original: VR Date Simulator: VR Game for Google Cardboard
description:
Virtual Reality Dating Simulator now available!

Have You ever wanted to approach a beautiful girl in the club or pub, but you haven't had the guts or You just said something stupid. It was because of lack of experienced on woman-man field.

But don't worry. Now You can simulate this situation to practice as long as You want.
So next time You approach the girl You will be ready and confident.


This app will show You:

1. How to get rid of fear of approaching a pretty girl through practicing in Virtual Reality.
2. How to read the body language of women so that finally You know what they mean and make the right move.
3. Discover good opener lines to start the conversation with every pretty girl You see.

Play on Your favorite VR Headset.

-------------------
Health Warning:
When using application remain stationary and stop using, when you experience discomfort or health reaction.
Ensure you read this document:
http://wenklystudio.com/legal/Warnings/VrHealthWarning.pdf before first use.
